alert.note: Alert for Carlisle; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carlisle, northeastern Hickman and west central Graves Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Clinton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fulgham around 400 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 17 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
